Certainly! There are several security awareness training materials and courses available online. Here are a few recommendations:

1. SANS Security Awareness: SANS offers a free online security awareness training program that covers a wide range of topics related to cybersecurity. They also offer paid courses for more advanced training. 2. Cybrary: Cybrary is an online cybersecurity training platform that offers a variety of free and paid courses, including security awareness training. 3. National Cyber Security Centre (NCSC): The NCSC is a branch of the UK government that provides cybersecurity guidance, including free online training courses for individuals and businesses. 4. Udemy: Udemy is an online learning platform that offers cybersecurity courses on a variety of topics, including security awareness training. 5. KnowBe4: KnowBe4 is a security awareness training company that offers various online training modules, including phishing simulations and social engineering simulations. 6. The Security Mentor: The Security Mentor offers a comprehensive library of security awareness training courses that cover a wide range of topics, including email security, mobile device security, and password security. It's essential to choose a training program that meets your specific needs and interests, so be sure to review the course curriculum and reviews before signing up.
